website_summaries.verdict: With the inclusion of d-mannose, these probiotics are a 2-in-2 treatment.
pros: D-mannose is found in cranberries and helps treat urinary tract infections, so this is a great probiotic for frequent sufferers
Users say these work for yeast infections as well

customer_reviews.title: Made for a woman!
customer_reviews.text: Just after a week I feel so much better. I have noticed a change already. Being a diabetic I was prone to all 3 issues that this works for and feel great. I don't know why I didn't look for something like this sooner instead of suffering. And the fact it's made for a woman makes it even better.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Healthy digestion system
customer_reviews.text: I've always struggled with being regular due to stress and with these probotiocs not only does it help me stay regular it has been changing my overall health

customer_reviews.title: The Probiotics and D-Mannose is a winning combination!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the Probiotics and D-Mannose together in the one product but it would be so helpful if the D-Mannose was 600mg rather than 100mg. Please consider raising the amount of D-Mannose in this product!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Matson

customer_reviews.title: Women's Probiotic
customer_reviews.text: I notice it has helped with digestion. I have been taking for about a month now and have seen a difference. I had been on the lookout for a good probiotic for women to help with urinary tract and yeast infections. Although they did not go away completely I saw some of the symptoms diminish. I am recommeding to all my family and friends.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for women
customer_reviews.text: I'm shocked at how well these worked. I was having some female problems and digestive problems and they helped with both. I ordered my second bottle because without them I see the problems come back. Absolutely love them.

customer_reviews.title: Great probiotic for regularity and UTI
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped tremendously with GI tract regularity and has helped ease symptoms of UTI.

customer_reviews.title: My tummy is happy
customer_reviews.text: I take probiotics daily to help keep any GI issues at bay. This product has not only probiotics, but D-mannose to help to prevent any urinary tract issues. D-mannose supplements alone cost about the same at Whole Foods, so I feel like this a really good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Not what product claims to be.
customer_reviews.text: I took these supplements for a few months. I have gut health issues and have my microbiome checked every 2 weeks. There were no probiotics present in any of my test results. None of the ingredients this product claims to contain were found in my system. I won't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Loveeee these
customer_reviews.text: This is so far the best women’s probiotic I have taken. I’ve noticed a huge difference in my vaginal and digestive health. To be more specific, I’m pretty prone to getting BV, but have not had any issues since I started taking these probiotics and I just overall feel better down there. I’ve also noticed how I feel less bloated after I eat, and how my bowel movements have been more regulated.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I normally have problems with BV such as odor and recurrances but so far this product has kept those symptoms at bay. This is the first product that I have found that has helped with this issue. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: My body feels more healthy now. Before i bought this my vagina would go through good and bad days in terms of the discharge produced. But now i get very little discharge and with only my natural smell.
customer_reviews.author: Natouri

customer_reviews.title: Taking care of my gf
customer_reviews.text: My gf started taking this product, She has had no symptoms of a Urinary Tract Infection, Kidney Infection and or Yeast Infection. Before she was having at least one of those symptoms every single month. She feel’s way better physically than She has in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Brandt Munson

customer_reviews.title: Probiotics that help women.
customer_reviews.text: I love it!😍 help me with my digestion issues. No harsh side effects. Very gentle. I recommend this product to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole W

customer_reviews.title: Gave Me Tummy Aches!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking probiotics for years. I thought maybe I should switch brands and get a different blend. The reviews for this one were so good I bought them without reading the inactive ingredients. Every day I took them I had stomach pain. After ruling out food poisoning, gluten, and soy I read the box. MALTODEXTRIN! Bingo! That is one of those general names of many things. The day I stopped taking them I felt better! The brand I by has zero additives. Definitely going back to that one.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna D

customer_reviews.title: Must have for women with BV
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with my PH being thrown off easily/constantly. For about two years I had BV and almost nothing worked to keep it in check. With other probiotics I would have to take double or triple the recommended dosage to have any type of results. With this product just once a day and my body is overall better and I’m glad. No BV and no crazy dosages of product to keep it that way.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby Maury

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff but expensive
customer_reviews.text: I like this stuff but I don't think it's worth $20 for a 30-day Supply
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: I had itching near my vaginal area from past 2 weeks due to weather change maybe, but after taking these supplements, the itching has surely reduced to a great extent. These supplements are definitely working and suiting my body. And since they are made with natural ingredients, I do not have to worry about their side effects I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: SHAILENDRA

customer_reviews.title: These were fine until i realized the ingredients
customer_reviews.text: So i wouldn't blame this probiotic solely, as lots of them contain the filler ingredient called maltodextrin. As someone taking probiotics to reduce yeast overgrowth in the body, i now know to avoid any probitotic with that ingredient for it feeds yeast. So it's kind of pointless. Hence why i only took one bottle of this and stopped and switched to a better probitotic. Ladies, a regular probiotic may do you more good than all of these ones specifically marketed to women's issues, when they in fact can be contributing to the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Herring

customer_reviews.title: my first women-specific probiotic - I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I was originally taking one of the most inexpensive general probiotics on Amazon, but I heard about how great women's probiotics were for maintaining women-specific health, so I decided to give these a try. I have to admit I'm impressed! Not only do they tackle my digestive issues, but they also help keep my flora healthy, as well. Since I'm uber-prone to all kinds of bacterial infections, this something extra is HUGELY appreciated. If you haven't tried a women's probiotic yet, I highly recommend you give this one a shot. You'll be very pleased. :)
customer_reviews.author: J McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to resolve UTI's and it did!
customer_reviews.author: SCW

customer_reviews.title: Caused pain, diarrhea, hemorrhoids
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a shot since it combined probiotics with cran extract, but I had awful side effects- abdominal/pelvic pain, diarrhea, bloating. I thought maybe the side effects would go away after the first week, but unfortunately all of this lead to hemorrhoids, which I am still dealing with now. I would advise everyone considering this product to think twice and do more research into probiotics.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Great Supplement/Probiotic to Take
customer_reviews.text: I have had recurring UTIs for a while now, and have been treating them with D-Mannose powder. It works, but then it comes back. I am hoping that this will alleviate that problem. I've only been taking it for 15 days, but I can tell it's helping with some of the symptoms of UTIs. I feel like it will help my overall vaginal/urinary tract health in the long run and will probably continue to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Ziesenis

customer_reviews.title: God only knows what's in these
customer_reviews.text: I needed a quality probiotic due to some female issues. These looked promising, but didn't have any effect on my health. I thought maybe this meant that my microbiome was fine as it was...until I tried a different female probiotic brand and was cured. This pill is full of placebo garbage that does nothing for you. Don't try these.
customer_reviews.author: Sarina M.

customer_reviews.title: Less effective than other brands - yeast infections are back.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I'm not thrilled with the quality of this product. I started taking a women's probiotic to address recurrent yeast infections. The first brand I tried (Flora Bloom) kept them at bay for several months, but the price wasn't right and it wasn't subscribe & save eligible, so I switched to this one because it was cheaper. Dumb mistake. A month and a half later, yeast infection. Pretty resistant to medication, too. Needless to say, I'm cancelling this subscription. I'm going to try Yeast is a Beast next.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Harris

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't take due to bottle being tampered with
customer_reviews.text: I just received these pills today... The outside of the bottle didn't have any type of seal and this it how the inner seal looked when opened. I refuse to take these since the bottle has clearly been tampered with. 30 pills is stated on outside of the bottle but when counted there were 28? Maybe i should stick to buying supplements at the store 😶
customer_reviews.author: Krystle

customer_reviews.title: Good probiotic
customer_reviews.text: I have issues with my bladder having constant infections, I also suffer from celiac disease so my stomach is a mess. This probiotic helped ease my bladder troubles and helped with digestion.
customer_reviews.author: ss

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised how fast and lasting one pill was. Glad I heard from a friend and found them.

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: Had a allergic reaction to these. Horrible swelling and itching all over especially my legs. Stopped taking them and it was gone in 2 days. Not the companies fault but be careful
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Z

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Product!! I was having several problems due to an imbalanced gut flora, this product had saved me from a number of ailments. My face was inflamed, my stomach was bloated and was having irregular bowel movements. I started seeing results after one day of taking the probiotic. The next morning I woke up, my face's redness had calm down and my stomach was flatter. After a few more days, more improvement to my skin and my stomach issues. Bowel movements are daily and my overall energy is much better. I would highly recommend this product to anyone feeling symptoms from an unhealthy gut.
customer_reviews.author: Helen C

customer_reviews.title: Better than represh!
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling with what seems like chronic BV for 2 years. I've been to the doctors several times and once I'm done with the antibiotics, its back the next day. I started taking rephresh, it seemed to work for the first few days but it came back. I even started taking 2 a day making it even more expensive for me but at that point I was willing to try anything. I found these and OMG I have been symptom free for 2 weeks! No discharge, no odor, NOTHING. I finally feel comfortable with myself again. I know every woman's body is different but I highly recommend this to anyone who struggles with BV.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't nothing for me. I still got a UTI.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Limehouse

customer_reviews.title: Two supplements in one
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was not only a probiotic, but for urinary tract support. I had previously been taking both a urinary supplement and a probiotic which was a hassle to swallow so many pills. I did find that after a week I started to get more regular and I did not get any urinary irritation so it apparently worked just as well to prevent the constant UTI's I got before taking d-mannose.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle W.

customer_reviews.title: Solution to my antibiotic use
customer_reviews.text: Due to a health condition, I’ve been taking antibiotics for 14 years. While they may be keeping me alive, not all of my system is happy with them. I’ve been taking this probiotic for a couple weeks now and it’s already helping. I’m not sure why none of my doctors suggested this! Since I’ll have to take an antibiotic for as long as I’m alive, I’d guess I’ll be taking these just as long, now that I found something to help.
customer_reviews.author: KeysGirl

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work at all!
customer_reviews.text: I had high hope for the product. It has great reviews. The description and ingredients look wonderful. I’ve started to take the first bottle. No changes. I thought it might have been damaged by heat during delivery. I tried the second bottle. Still no effects. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Bossa Nova Lover

customer_reviews.title: No Refrigerator Needed Probiotic
customer_reviews.text: Quality Probiotic without the refrigeration! All natural ingredients and quality tested. If you are improving your get health Physician's Choice should be your choice. It has made my digestive system much more healthier. It regulates my bowel movements on regular daily schedule. I take one at night before bed on an empty stomach and wake up the next morning ready to go. No IBS, No bloating and No gas. Also probiotic is good for the immune system. Since taking probiotics I'm overall healthy and do not get sick. I would recommend this product to my family and friends

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I started becoming constipated and rather then taking something just for the one time I wanted to try and find something that would help all the time so this problem wouldn't continued. By using this product my system is more regulated and don't feel like I am bloated anymore and I haven't been constipated since taking this pill. Didn't think this one little pill would help my digestive system but it has.

customer_reviews.title: Best Probiotic!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few probiotics before, usually from Whole Foods (refrigerator type) and while it worked well, it didn't completely take away my heartburn. I tried this one from Amazon given all the great reviews and they are absolutely true! I noticed a difference after the first day but really after about a week, absolutely no heartburn at all (and yes I should stay away from food triggers but even after having something a little spicy to test it out, still had no heartburn)! Highly recommend this probiotic!
customer_reviews.author: pinkie

customer_reviews.title: Feel better the first week of using
customer_reviews.text: After having a complete hysterectomy, I was having issues with dryness and my doctor told me to start using Replens. Since taking Women's Probiotic I have noticed a change with my "feminine health". This was an unexpected bonus. I originally chose this product to maintain gut health. I am totally satisfied and will continue to use Physician's Choice Women's Probiotic.

customer_reviews.title: Yeast infection is gone, skin is better!
customer_reviews.text: I was dealing with a yeast infection for around 2 months. I wanted to take a good quality probiotic and this is on the top 5 for best Probiotics according to "bestreviews.com"- they're vegan, probiotics+ prebiotic + Procran & D-Mannose, after some research on these ingredients I decided to give it a try. My yeast infection is gone and my face is looking good, I deal with hormonal acne and while I am taking this probiotics my skin is better then ever, I don't know if it coincidence or they healed my acne... the reason a bought them was to fight the yeast infection, but the acne solution was a plus. definitely will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia M.

customer_reviews.title: They work quite well.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product. You can tell they put a lot of work into all aspects of it. Lots of research, high quality materials, and the like. customer_reviews.title: Does't work for me!
customer_reviews.text: It does not work for me. Constipation after taking this pill...
customer_reviews.author: Celine

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I've had stomach issues (problems with bowel movements esp), acne problems (I'm in my 40s), had urination problems to a point where I almost went to the Dr for a possible UTI (yikes), and since I am now premenopausal, I've had to deal with more than normal women problems!! This product helped balance my digestion (calmed down my digestion to what seems to be normal # of movements a day), prevented potential UTI, helped with acne (no new outbreaks since I started!) And especially helped with the feminine stuff (no more embarrassing moments!) I love it and will keep it as part of my daily regimen!
customer_reviews.author: PitaCheng

customer_reviews.title: Read then make your own decision
customer_reviews.text: This probiotic made me so sick all the time. Every time I eat I would get sick. I am now bringing myself off of them and it's taking a couple of days to get it out of my system. These came highly recommended but I would not recommend them for anyone. Also I will be transparent and say I did have stomach issues before taking these and I will also admit that I do have a bit of an eating disorder. I want this to be transparent that way you can make your own decision but this was my experience. I cannot wait till these are completely out of my system.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With This Probiotic
customer_reviews.text: I was taking Garden of Life. Honestly, my issue wasn't with the quality of their product. It was with their parent company. I have some major ethical issues with doing business with Nestle. I can't participate in their business practices even as a customer. I was looking for a quality product from a company that I felt comfortable doing business with. Finding a high quality multi strain probiotic supplement from a reputable company wasn't easy. But, I feel like I've found that with Physicians choice.
customer_reviews.author: Beastmodepink82

customer_reviews.title: Switched to this from the Blue Bottle
customer_reviews.text: During my first week on this probiotic, I found that I dropped about 5 pounds but I put most of it back on after a few weeks of being on the product. I feel that this probiotic keeps me regular. I have enjoyed this version as it has helped keep some of my feminine issues at bay. Prior to starting this, I was getting yeast infections almost monthly. I am happy to say that I have not noticed any of the same symptoms I had before and that is the best feeling. I will be repurchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: Blcvnc

customer_reviews.title: combines everything into one convenient pill
customer_reviews.text: My 89 year old mother has had issues with her stomach and bladder since her stroke. She doesn't walk so has issues with UTI so this product combines everything she needs in a convenient pill. She is in a nursing facility and I used to supply them with a lot of pills- cranberry, probiotics with prebiotics but her urine would often still be cloudy. This product even has the d-mannose! Her urine is clearer and we have this on subscribe and save! Thank you for a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Fast and effective
customer_reviews.text: It’s only been a few days since I started this probiotic but I can already feel the difference! I have been struggling to get my system back in check over the last 6+ months after a bought with candida overgrowth. I had been taking three different supplements to alleviate the lingering symptoms but they weren’t doing the job fully. This probiotic has me feeling back to normal again and I am in love!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Rogers

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I was having so many stomach issues ranging from bloating to inconsistent bowl movements. A co worker mentioned this product and informed me of many similiar issues it helped fix for her. So I gave it a shot. At first I was shocked by the price but once I compared the price to all of the other over the counter expenses I was already purchasing it made sense to spend the 20+ bucks a month. Within 2 days I noticed a drastic change in how I was digesting my meals. I was actually using the bathroom like a normal human being. No straining, no gassy pains. This product has made me a lifetime customer.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lea

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking probiotics for a while. I like the Physicians Choice Womens Probiotic since it’s specifically for women and it also has a prebiotic. This supplement worked faster plus I felt more energized sooner than others I have tried. Another important point is my Dr recommended this product to help during chemotherapy treatments. This is an excellent product.

customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to contact the seller but can no longer find a way to do this. In my second subscribed order the bottle contained 2 empty fell caps. There was no powder in the bottle so they were not broken. I am concerned about quality control.
customer_reviews.author: mamomoma

customer_reviews.title: Best probiotic so far!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these probiotics for three weeks now and am happy with them. In the past, I have had issues with finding a probiotic that doesn't upset my stomach and these don't cause any issues for me. I have Crohn's disease, eczema, and suffer from frequent UTI's. Upon research, I found that probiotics help with all three of these conditions so I was willing to try these, especially because they have D-mannose and cranberry in them. Since starting these probiotics, I haven't even had one UTI. The only downsides to these is the cost for a 30 day supply, and I think they are causing my skin to break out.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do the job for me!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about a week or more. I am not happy with the results. I'm very bloated and gassy, something I didn't feel at all with my previous brand. The capsules are comparable to the gelcaps you can buy to put essential oils in - kind of large but smooth & no taste. I won't be buying this brand again, disappointed since the reviews were so good.
customer_reviews.author: Virgo43

customer_reviews.title: Worked For Me
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always struggled with UTI’s, kidney infections, and indigestion. After searching for a probiotic that could help in these areas, I found the Physician’s Choice Women’s Probiotic. I read the reviews and decided to try it. It really helped me! I had no issues whatsoever while taking this and felt better. I wish I had found it sooner. I even discussed it with my doctor on a recent visit and she agreed that it was a great decision to start a probiotic. I definitely recommend trying this product.

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I have ben taking this product for almost a full month, and I can feel a difference in my bloating and feminine health. I had been getting a surge of yeast infections, after a respiratory illness, that just kept coming back. I finally got rid of the infection and replaced my old probiotic gummies with these probiotics (they are stronger and offer D-mannose and cranberry). So far - I feel MUCH better - and no return of the nasty yeast beast! I will be taking these pills as long as I am able!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie A Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: With Interstitial Cystitis (IC) I find d-mannose very helpful. When I saw your product contained d-mannose I decided to give it a try. I have been taking probiotics for several years. I find them very helpful overall. Your product did not fall short. It took some getting used to, as new products often do, but I would buy again. Works as well, if not better, then my last two types of probiotic.

customer_reviews.title: My bloating and stomach pain is gone!
customer_reviews.text: My stomach is really sensitive to certain foods and I tend to get very constipated and bloated. To the point of causing stomach pain. These probiotics have seemed to really have worked wonders! I no longer have stomach pain or bloating. My bathroom trips have become more regular. I’m very impressed with how well this product has helped me in a short amount of time:) Would highly recommend! Will definitely repurchase.

customer_reviews.text: I have stomach issues including constipation. This seems to help keep me regular, and I can definitely tell a difference if I forget to take it. It's only one pill, easy to swallow, with no bad taste. I appreciate that there are extra ingredients in it specifically for women and it is in a reasonable price range!
customer_reviews.author: karri

customer_reviews.title: Great for endometriosis bloating
customer_reviews.text: I have severe endometriosis on my ovaries, uterus, and colon. Because of this I must be really cautious about inflammation because It effects my pain level. Bloating is very common with endo and it’s very painful. This probiotic helps my bloating, helps keep me regular, and helps other stomach issues that i have found only quality probiotics help with. I used to have diarrhea after almost every meal. That changed when I started taking probiotics. I used to use a liquid probiotic that must be stored in a fridge. It was very expensive and I couldn’t travel with It. This probiotic, a pill form, works just as well. Is portable. And is more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: catstebla

customer_reviews.title: Prebiotic AND probiotic
customer_reviews.text: I love that this product is a prebiotic and a probiotic and it's affordable. I just started taking this product and I already feel less bloating! The addition of cranberry is also a big plus!

customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a women’s probiotic to help with some general gastro ickiness. Other probiotics have upset my stomach even more, while others have simply not seemed to be effective at all. This (Physicians Choice) probiotic seems to be helping! I’ve been taking it daily for almost 2 months now, and the past few weeks *things* have cleared up! I’m not sure the procran addition actually does anything, but it can’t hurt either?
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.text: I have mild but persistent gi issues as well as female issues. Since I started taking these I noticed a definite difference in my digestive problems. Absolutely love them, especially for the price. I have paid upwards of $60 per month for products with less ingredients and less noticeable effects. Digestive issues have greatly diminished by taking this product everyday.
customer_reviews.author: K Suite

customer_reviews.title: Quality Probiotics
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with these probiotics. I was taking probiotics regularly for some time, then stopped because of the price. I started to notice a difference in my digestion. So I started taking them again. I am currently using Physician's Choice probiotics and so far so good. I am starting to notice an improvement in my digestions and a lighter less bloated feeling overall. This brand claims to use clinically proven ingredients and the recommended dosages and is vegetarian-friendly both of which I really appreciate.

customer_reviews.text: I HAVE SUFFERED FROM BV FOR ALMOST 8 MONTHS , TRY EVERYTHING YOU NAME IT, FROM HOME REMEDY , LIKE SEATING IN SALT WATER , BORIC ACID SUPPORTERS, OVER THE COUNTER VAGINAL GEL TO 7 DAYS ANTIBIOTIC COURSE NOTHING HELPED, I GAVE THIS A SHOT AND IM HAPPY I DID, IT CLEARED ALMOST ALL THE DISCHARGE , EXCEPT LIKE A PEA SIZE WHEN I WAKE UP IN THE MORNING, BUT THE REST OF THE DAY IM DISCHARGED FREE, THANK YOU SO MUCH, I just wanna add something else, it will give you diarrhea so stay home after meal so you can use the bathroom, 😂😂😂
customer_reviews.author: NEW BEGINNING

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan - UTI and yeast infection within 1 month
customer_reviews.text: So I wanted to like this product. After doing quite a bit of research I settled on this product to help with digestion. It was just an added benefit that it promotes vaginal health. Although I’ve struggled with vaginal health issues (BV, UTIs, and yeast) in the past, I’ve been pretty ok on this front since last summer. Well, I started taking this probiotic about a month ago - 2 weeks ago I dealt with a raging, very painful UTI (haven’t had one in years) and I am currently dealing with a very uncomfortable yeast infection. I Threw away the rest of the bottle and will be going back to a grocery store probiotic. I do NOT recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: TAKE IT IF YOU WANT MASSIVE STOMACH PAIN WHERE YOU CANT SLEEP AT NIGHT

This stuff doesn’t work and I don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: Last year I started having stomach issues and generally feeling uneasy in my gut. After doing some research I learned that adding a probiotic to my daily routine could help keep my microbiome happy and healthy. Within a few days of taking the pills I noticed a huge difference in how I felt. I know they are working because on a recent vacation I forgot to bring them and my stomach went back to its old ways. Needless to say I won't be traveling without them again and will continue to keep them as an integral part of my wellness program.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than drug store brand
customer_reviews.text: I used to take a drug store brand probiotic and had to run to the bathroom quite often. Probiotics for Women seems to be a gentler product --- or the combination fits better with my own gut bacteria :-). I haven't ever had any digestive issues so I don't really know why I am taking these, though. But maybe I stay healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Elkwood

customer_reviews.title: Great For UTI's
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter primarily but take it myself as well. My daughter, 23, has had frequent UTI's for the past 10+ years even though she takes a daily low dose antibiotic. I decided it couldn't hurt to give this product a try and was very impressed with how well it works for her. She has had little to no UTI's since she started taking it roughly 5 weeks ago. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Webb

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try for price paid...
customer_reviews.text: The instructions state one tablet a day which I did for a week without a marked result. Increased dose to 2 per day and saw a slight inmprovement on the movements. Will finish the bottle and will update this review only if there is further improvement. I had no noticeable side affects, no taste from the capsules, easy to swallow with water. Was worth a try for the price I paid!
customer_reviews.author: Hil's Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: 1 - COPY TEXT BELOW: I love this product! Was taking the blue bottle until I noticed my husband was taking them too so I switched to the women's. I noticed I can stand dairy alot easier now and my tummy has been alot happier since taking these!! Definitely recommend for gut health.
customer_reviews.author: Colton's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Ripped me off
customer_reviews.text: The bottle is pretty small which is cool and the pills are too but my bottle came with only 25 pills and not the whole 30. I read the bottle were it says 30 pills should be the serving size but it didn't look like 30 in the bottle so I counted. I've never been given the wrong amount of pills im not sure what to do.
customer_reviews.author: sarouth deam

customer_reviews.title: Tongue is less fuzzy!  👅
customer_reviews.text: I have used the product for about 3 weeks now. I was looking for a product that would also address candida. So far it seems like my tongue isn’t as fuzzy. I did have a cystoscopy just over two weeks ago and did develop a UTI and since I have been on an antibiotic so it is hard to tell what other benefits I’m receiving from taking the probiotic. Looking forward to getting better and letting this stuff do it’s job! Too early to give it 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: This Made Me Feel So Much Better
customer_reviews.text: Being a women aging there were things happining in my body that I didn't like. My PH balance was off and I could tell. I felt this working within the first 2 days. I really thing the first 24 hours. I seemed to have a slight fish odor. This definitely stopped it for me immediately. I will continue to take this. I like the way this makes me feel.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Works well , even without me taking the capsule .
customer_reviews.text: I really like these ! I personally have a hard time with pills , so I actually open the capsule and pour the contents in my mouth and hurry up and follow it with a little juice . Lol All in all it still works great for me . I definitely notice a positive difference with my feminine health . I was having reoccurring issues with BV and prescriptions weren’t helping . This did the trick . Waiting on my 2nd bottle to come in now .
customer_reviews.author: Larryett Pearson

customer_reviews.title: I suffered from belly bloat
customer_reviews.text: I suffered from belly bloat and mild constipation. I feel much better and go more easily. I can't really tell about my vaginal health,that may take longer to notice any difference, though i had no problems
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: Great that is formulated for women
customer_reviews.text: After quite a bit of research, and a recommendation from my doctor, I knew taking a probiotic would help with the irritation I had been having. I tend to feel like I am having a bladder infection, but in reality it is irritated yet the symptoms are the same. This formula has worked to calm my symptoms. I take it before bedtime each night and have been doing so since I purchased it. My symptoms have subsided and I feel I am not constantly thinking about when my next flare-up will be. And that it is designed for women is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Compared to Garden of Life
customer_reviews.text: I have had bowel issues but I was not consistent in taking probiotic figured during quarantine I'd try to regulate my problems. I bought these pills and from the literal next day after taking them I was more regular and felt less bloated than I had in years. I ended up leaving the bottle on vacation. When I got back home I instead ordered the Garden of Life Brand thinking all probiotics are the same. Which I have now been on for 10+ days and have not been seeing the same positive effects I once had. I can confidently say this brand worked better for me and was more effective. Repurchasing today.
customer_reviews.author: Ece

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I got these about a week ago, and since then I have been more than happy about it! The packaging is nice, there is no gross flavor when you take them. The capsule is vegan! Which is important to me. Another perk is that it does have the cranberry extract to help with urinary tract health as well as digestive health! I have noticed improved regularity since I began taking them, and they are definitely going to become a daily habit from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Hard painful 2swallow
customer_reviews.text: Bought in hopes of finding good pre/probiotic. Was taking meds one night & almost choked. Throat hurt for days. Same thing few days later. Examined All meds, got to this one. Opened the capsule (like I did w/others) & found insides 2b thick, hard. I thought maybe a fluke, probably that one. So I opened 3 more. Same thing. Idk if they were all That thick; had almost finished the bottle out I can’t swallow it. Plus not sure I want that in my body! An explanation would be great. if all probiotics are this way, be good 2 know. Finally I can’t recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah B

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT, I use to be on daily antibiotics for reoccurring UTI's
customer_reviews.text: I have an autoimmune disease and one of the issues I had in the past was continual UTI issues and I was prescribed daily antibiotics which I hated taking because they also made my nerve pain worse. So I have been taking these for months and have not gotten any UTI's since taking them. They also help me to have a regular bowel movement each morning which is another issue I face (GI issues) with my autoimmune disease. I recommended them to my family also.
customer_reviews.author: C.  Brown

customer_reviews.title: Infections free!
customer_reviews.text: During all 2019 I went MONTHLY to my gynecologist because infections continue appearing and appearing. I was taking antibiotics monthly! My stomach got so damaged. I've started my 3rd month with this women's probiotic and I can say I've been infections free! I'm soooo happy that I can't thank them enough. Thank you physicians choice for creating this product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a probiotic to start taking as I was having digestive symptoms after starting a Keto diet. I found these on Amazon and I believe they have helped as my digestive symptoms have been minimized since I have started taking these probiotics. I also thought that it was neat that these particular probiotics have some extra ingredients to help with women's health. So far I really like these and plan to continue taking them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps with chronic yeast
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many, many probiotics and other products to help with chronic yeast infections. This is the first probiotic that I’ve taken where I notice a difference. I noticed within the first week that my symptoms were getting better. I took it daily for a month and was symptom free for over a month after I ran out. I’m starting to have symptoms again and I’m realizing this is a product I will just stay on continuously. I’ve tried too many things to list over the years but needless to say after 20 years of suffering with this issue I am truly relieved to find a solution that works for me!
customer_reviews.author: fortyFort

customer_reviews.title: Great for women’s health
customer_reviews.text: Great for gut health, lady parts health, and skin too! I’ve been using this product for a few months now and took for granted how my health improved while I was on it! When I ran out, I thought oh it’s fine I have my other vitamins anyway - but probiotics work a little differently in that they can stabilize your microbiome. When I was off it I noticed an outbreak in yeast infections, acne, bloating... didn’t realize how much it helped until it was gone! No side effects for me and takes a few days to kick in but you’ll notice it. I take it once daily. This is my personal experience and unsponsored review.
customer_reviews.author: Cosima

customer_reviews.title: Helps with women’s issues down there
customer_reviews.text: I take probiotics multiple times a day to try and help my lactose intolerance, leaky gut and GERD. This product has been one of the probiotics I take every day. I was so happy it had D-Mannose in it because I struggle with burning down there sometimes-and while taking it, I didn’t notice any more infections or issues! I am also quite happy that it doesn’t have to be refrigerated because that means I can take it on the go with me. It definitely helped my lady issues and helped calm down my stomach, too. I wish the pill size was a teensy bit smaller since I have trouble swallowing pills, but it’s nothing I can’t handle.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Smith

customer_reviews.title: They are not what they say they are...
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews for this product and I was certain that it was going to work for what I needed. I have had vaginal health issues and I bought these to help with that. I used them for 2 months straight thinking that maybe they needed time to get into my system to work. After 2 months of taking them, there was no change whatsoever. I bought another probiotic and saw result immediately (Pro-B). Maybe these work for digestive health for some, I didn't see any change in my digestion after 2 months over taking them.
customer_reviews.author: Neshia

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, this didn't work for me. After about 10 days of severe stomach aches and upset stomach, I stopped taking the pills. I read a lot of reviews that said their stomachs were fine with no side effects. I personally have a very sensitive stomach and think that's why my body didn't react well. Maybe it will work for you, but not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Works for a month and causes issues!
customer_reviews.text: This worked for me for about a month and then it caused more feminine issues then I already had! In the beginning I noticed my body wasn’t retaining so much water like it usually does, I stayed at comfortable weight and then out of no where my body started to react to it. My acne came back with a vengeance, I started to get yeast infections, and I started to retain water weight again! I do not recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty AND good for you
customer_reviews.text: I love this one! I did NOT check calories, salt, ingredients.... I just eat it and enjoy it. I use it in smoothies, in my coffee... It's tasty, really EASY to mix with anything and has no unpleasant feel or aftertaste. I'll probably buy 100 boxes more, it's just too good NOT to buy it. One problem: it does not LAST very long. Duh! I almost "inhale" it (joke! Don't try to inhale it!) really fast!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Little smelly but works great
customer_reviews.text: It’s expensive for its quantity but it helped me with the bowel movement. It was better than other probiotic products I took before. However, it does have some unpleasant smell, which I did not mind that much.
customer_reviews.author: gobright12

customer_reviews.title: Happy Guts! Heal Your Gut Flora.
customer_reviews.text: I had so many odd reactions in my intestines to ordinary meals and not having regular bowel movements that I started do research. In my research I learned the names of all the prebiotics and probiotics needed to improve my gut flora. This product was the only one I found that had it all. I have been taking it for two months and my guts are very happy now and you can set your watch with my bowel movements!
customer_reviews.author: T. L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for feminine health
customer_reviews.text: I have been having feminine issues over the past few month and I found these and have not had any issues since then. If I do end up feeling any of these conditions coming up I usually try to double up on my probiotics (even though I don’t really need to) and the seems to help get rid of anything faster. I’m very satisfied and can thank this probiotic for helping me feel a sense of normalcy. Also great for the gut digestion !
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: After years of problems with my gastrointestinal system & trying other products, decided to try this as a last resort. I liked the idea of cranberries since they also help your kidneys. After six weeks, my stomach is much better & everything is moving like it should without any occasional help.
customer_reviews.author: Jac

customer_reviews.title: Purchased to help with unpleasant digestive issues
customer_reviews.text: By unpleasant digestive issues, I mean foul flatulence. I researched what I could do because my love for vegetables is creating a rift in my marriage. I added these to my daily vitamin intake and it made a difference in about 2 weeks. Has my gas gone away? No but it's less frequent. Is it putrid? Definitely not. How have I been living my whole life without this? I currently take it in combination with a prenatal vitamin.
customer_reviews.author: Jena Miller

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Statement in ad
customer_reviews.text: This ad is very misleading. It states that this product can be purchased “one time only for $22.24 for 74 count”. I checked the radio button to order. When I received my order of probiotics, I received a bottle with 30 capsules. Either you’re going to honor the statements made in your ad, or for sake of honesty, remove the statement from your ad!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to stabilize woman's condition down there and this product seems to be the best on Market especially because it contains cranberry I have been taking this type of product 4 years. I always Buy High Quality. Always good results. it keeps my tummy happy. it makes me smell good if you know what i mean. it has no side affects. easy to take. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Milla

customer_reviews.title: Big thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I started taking Physician's Choice probiotics at the beginning of this year and have tried the 60 billion CFU and then the one specifically for women. I like the components in the women's version the best. It is a powerful probiotic and combined with D-Mannose & ProCran it supplies more of my body's needs. Cranberries are super important for antioxidants. It is my probiotic of choice and would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really surprised at how fresh and awesome this has been
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get pre and pro biotics to help with my gut and urinary tract and vaginal health. I also have a build up of a lot of yeast and fungus and it was causing so many issues with sleep and mood and acne and pain. And since i started taking these its been helping so much. My acne is clearing up im not gaining weight and i am sleeping beautifully. Plus my urinary health has been amazing. Okay so now its been a few months and i guess i need to add a higher dose? It's just not helping as much.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb

customer_reviews.title: Helped with my stomach issues
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for more than 6 months and am very pleased. I've had less stomach aches and have been more regular. This is saying a lot for me, as I've battled with stomach issues and not being regular for most of my life. I'd highly recommend. There is not a better probiotic targeted at women on the market for this price point. Most don't have 50 billion CFU nor the added bonus of cranberry.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh.C

customer_reviews.title: Best probiotic!
customer_reviews.text: I have loved this Probiotic. I’ve got to be more consistent with it, I know when I have forgotten to take it for a couple days. I have such a delicate balance between being fine and then having yeast type symptoms, that I just have to keep on top of it with a good probiotic and watching my sugar intake. This one is fabulous at rebalancing if I got off.
customer_reviews.author: awix

product_meta.title: Prebiotics & Probiotics for Women - Clinically Proven ProCran - Organic Prebiotics, 50 Billion CFU, D-Mannose & Cranberry for Digestive, Immune, Feminine Health, Soy & Dairy Free, 30 Vegan Capsules
feature_bullets: ONCE DAILY PROBIOTICS FOR WOMEN: A probiotic supplement for women with 50 BILLION CFUs plus clinically proven ingredients to help promote digestion, immune support and feminine health. Organic prebiotics and 6 probiotic strains with D-Mannose & ProCran, a clinically proven cranberry extract that provides powerful antioxidants. 50 mg of ProCran is equivalent to 2,500 mg of cranberries without the sugar and calories.

PREBIOTIC + PROBIOTIC WITH PATENTED CRANBERRY EXTRACT: A natural women’s prebiotic-probiotic combination that can help with UTI relief and vaginosis. Contains patented and clinically proven ProCran, a cranberry extract which naturally contains proanthocyanidins (PACs) - a key cranberry antioxidant. Cranberries support your immune system and protect your body from free radicals. ProCran is clinically proven to support urinary tract health.

ORGANIC PREBIOTIC & PROBIOTIC BLEND: Our Women's Probiotic contains organic prebiotics and natural vegan probiotics for a complete synbiotic to support digestive health, urinary tract support & immune system. A shelf-stable vegan probiotic in delayed-release capsules with NO: dairy, soy, gluten, milk, egg, wheat, peanuts, or shellfish.

50 BILLION CFUs & 6 PROBIOTIC STRAINS: Naturally inspired probiotic with targeted doctor-approved probiotic strains for women, our probiotic includes: Lactobacillus Gasseri, Acidophilus, Plantarum, Paracasei, Casei and Bifidobacterium Lactis.

SAFETY ASSURED STANDARD OF QUALITY: Our women's prebiotic and probiotic is 3rd-party tested for purity and manufactured in the USA using imported and domestic ingredients. Our product is contained in acid-resistant capsules to protect against stomach acid with delayed-release technology to ensure the probiotics reach the intestines and release where they’re needed. No refrigeration required.
